product_name: Moving Comfort Sprint Insulated Vest - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Quilted with low-bulk PrimaLoft(R), the women's Moving Comfort Sprint Insulated Vest delivers just-right core warmth as well as sporty sophistication. PrimaLoft ECO insulation uses post-consumer recycled material to create a high-loft, thermally efficient, earth-friendly insulation. DriLayer(R) Plush added at side panels for shape and comfort. Full-length zipper with zipper garage; zip hand pockets. Shock cords with toggles adjust the hem. Moving Comfort Sprint Insulated Vest has reflectivity on the back. Closeout.
short_description: Quilted with low-bulk PrimaLoft(R), the women's Moving Comfort Sprint Insulated Vest delivers just-right core warmth as well as sporty sophistication.
